Version Upgrades
Version - 8.0

2 min
what's new? brought to you linear formula for price calculation, custom size product, control additional options by size, size based setup cost, re order from admin panel, google fonts upload, phone number validation, shipment package calculator, and much more! review the brief release notes for the ops v8 0 featured videos watch the videos for some of our latest features released in version 8 0 admin panel assign products printer assign products printer understand the rule based product assignment to the printer (vendor) product options product options create all product options only once & assign them to multiple products shipping packages shipping packages configure master packages, product wise shipping packages, and more front & designer studio label product setting label product setting learn to control the product sizes via additional options for label type products upload center updates upload center updates watch how the upload center has improved overall with multiple file uploads
